SELECT A.ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , (SELECT B.PD_NAME FROM XTB_ODINFOXD B WHERE B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM AND ROWNUM=1) AS PD_NAME /*제품명1개*/ , (SELECT COUNT(*)-1 FROM XTB_ODINFOXD B WHERE B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM) AS count /*주문 제품 갯수*/ , A.ORDER_AMT /*주문금액*/ , A.ORDER_CON /*주문상태 */ , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.ORDER_CON) AS ORDER_CON_NM /*주문상태 명*/ , A.COM_NAME , A.BIZR_NUM , A.CEO_NAME , A.COM_TEL , A.POST_NUM , A.BASC_ADDR , A.DTL_ADDR , A.STAFF_NAME , A.STAFF_MAIL , A.STAFF_CPON , A.ORDER_MSG FROM XTB_ODINFOXM A WHERE REPLACE(BIZR_NUM,'-', '') = REPLACE(#{BIZR_NUM},'-', '')
AND ORDER_PW = #{ORDER_PW}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM POLARBEAR.TB_BKINFOXM WHERE PD_CODE = #{PD_CODE} AND MEMB_ID = #{REGP_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NUM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ORDER_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ORDER_DATE , ORDER_PW , ORDER_AMT , ORDER_CON , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(ORDER_CON) AS ORDER_CON_NM /*주문상태 명*/ , PAY_METD , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(PAY_METD) AS PAY_METD_NM /*결제수단 명*/ , COM_NAME , BIZR_NUM , CEO_NAME , COM_TEL , POST_NUM , BASC_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , EXTRA_ADDR , STAFF_NAME , STAFF_MAIL , STAFF_CPON , ORDER_MSG , ATFL_ID , DLVY_ATFL , CARD_ATFL , ARRIVAL_DATE FROM XTB_ODINFOXM /*주문정보 마스터*/ WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}

SELECT A.ORDER_DTNUM /*주문상세번호*/ , A.ORDER_NUM , A.PD_CODE , A.PD_NAME , A.PD_PRICE , A.PDDC_GUBN , A.PDDC_VAL , A.ORDER_QTY , A.ORDER_AMT , A.ORDER_CON , A.PAY_METD , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.PAY_METD) AS PAY_METD_NM /*결제수단 명*/ , A.DLVY_CON , A.DLVY_TDN , A.DLVY_ROWNUM , (SELECT DLVY_NAME FROM XTB_ODDLAIXM B WHERE B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM AND B.DLVY_ROWNUM = A.DLVY_ROWNUM) DLVY_NAME FROM XTB_ODINFOXD A /*주문정보 상세*/ WHERE A.ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.ORDER_DTNUM

SELECT A.ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , A.DLVY_ROWNUM , A.DLVY_NAME , A.STAFF_NAME , A.STAFF_CPON , A.POST_NUM , A.BASC_ADDR , A.DTL_ADDR , A.DLVY_MSG FROM XTB_ODDLAIXM A /*주문배송지정보 */ WHERE A.ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
